timeline.message: It returns an empty Jinjava string for null values
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:HubSpot/jinjava into chunk-resolver-fix
Treat null values as null while resolving
Use constant for jinjava empty string

timeline.bodyText: This should be the only place where null needs to be swapped out for the empty string as this is the last step where the object must be resolved to a string. (That string could be presented in the final output of the render)
timeline.author: jasmith-hs

replies.bodyText: See https://private.hubteam.com/opengrok/xref/all/github.com-HubSpot-jinjava%23master/src/main/java/com/hubspot/jinjava/lib/expression/DefaultExpressionStrategy.java#22 where null is replaced with empty when converting to a string.
replies.author: jasmith-hs
